reviews.review_msg: This is the BEST prof I have had so far.1.His lecture is EXTREMELY useful;2.Very responsible, willing to provide extra help;3.Midterm is fair(you HAVE to pay attention in class and GET YOUR PEN ready to copy down his KEYPOINT, whatever he said is important IS GOING TO BE ON THE TEST,if you skip one class,u lose5%on ur final<-my prediction.GOODLUCK!
